name(Volcanic Winter)

snap(50,50,50)

sky(255,255,255)
fog(144,144,144)
ground(255,0,0)
polys(144,0,0)

fadefrom(8000)
density(8)

nlaps(3)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,180)p
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(26,0,11200,0)pr
